name: Park and Ride - Green Roof Sarnafil Installation
Scope Description (from Bravada SOW) and item numbers
SOW description entered
Attach TDS for application
Substrate washed / cleaned & assessed for surface uniformity (photos attached below)
Substrate temperature is not less than 10*C and no greater then 35*C
Substrate free from pooling or ponding water (Moisture gauge photo attached below)
Adequate fall in substrate?
If any of these checkpoints fail information and required action by builder provided in comments below
Saw cuts (15mm deep x 5 mm wide) at Watertite membrane junctions able to accept Type 5 profile?
Installation of Type 6 profile for junction with Watertite membrane?
Installation of Type 8 profile on upturn?
Adhesive installed to manufacturer's specification?
Record (Photo) batch number and date of manufacture of adhesive
Installation of sheet membrane to floor areas (min. 50mm overlaps)?
Siphonic drains detailed to manufacturers specification?
Installation of Type 5 profile to junction?
Installation of sheet membrane to perimeters, incl. compatible sealant as required (profiles welded)?
Installation of Dilatec tape detail to existing P-1200 membrane?
Area completed to manufacturer's specification? - photos attached below
